description.value:
This collar is a silken cord from which hangs a small silver amulet that bears the likeness of a woman with her hand at her throat. A gasping lament is a powerful coda instrument that's worn rather than held. While you sing, you gain a +2 item bonus to Intimidation checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize] and to Performance checks.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the collar to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Message]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Charm], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Command]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sonata Span], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ventriloquism]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Enthrall], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shatter]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Honeyed Words], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Infectious Melody]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Command], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Concordant Choir]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
